content.rendered:
In FX’s new horror series, there is a house that lives an independent life. Not a piece of today, but built in the 1920s, but its past has ruined the lives of several families. We get to know the Harmon family, their backgrounds and also why they leave their past behind. They move into a new house and try to start a new life. This is where the house and the strange neighbors will intervene, and even the new owners will be given a volunteer cleaning lady who will later turn out to be an eternal piece of the house.
Number of seasons: 11 (2011)
Status: Ongoing
Creators: Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk
Channel: FX
Starring: Lady Gaga, Kathy Bates, Angela Bassett
